txt.en: 'Aragorn gave us all some advice pertaining to Epic Battles, [placeholder]. Do you remember? Speak to me to learn all about them!' Talk to Gamling to experience a short tutorial about the Epic Battles system.
Before the walls of the Hornburg, Aragorn gave his companions some advice about the Epic Battles to come.
'I will remind you of what Aragorn said to us before the walls of the Hornburg... but quickly!'
Talk to Gamling and complete the 'Epic Battles: Basic Training' tutorial
Gamling wishes to give you some advice about Epic Battles.
